analysis.purpose: To forward a Daily Mail article that claims a woman's allegations against Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein were fabricated

details: Daily Mail article about sexual assault allegations against Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein being fabricated

analysis.summary: Reid Weingarten forwards a Daily Mail article to Jeffrey Epstein that claims a woman's allegations of being assaulted at a sex party involving Donald Trump and Epstein at age 13 were fabricated, with the email marked as high importance and containing legal disclaimers.
